foreignData.name: Magmamagier-Macht
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur hat „{T}: Diese Kreatur fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu."Falls die verzauberte Kreatur ein Zauberer ist, hat sie „{T}: Diese Kreatur fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu."

foreignData.name: Destreza del lavamante
foreignData.text:
La criatura encantada tiene "{T}: Esta criatura hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura objetivo".
Si la criatura encantada es un Hechicero, tiene "{T}: Esta criatura hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo".

foreignData.name: Art du lavamancien
foreignData.text:
La créature enchantée a « {T} : Cette créature inflige 1 blessure à la créature ciblée. »
Si la créature enchantée est un sorcier, il a « {T} : Cette créature inflige 2 blessures à la créature ciblée. »

foreignData.name: Abilità del Lavamante
foreignData.text:
La creatura incantata ha "{T}: Questa creatura infligge 1 danno a una creatura bersaglio".
Se la creatura incantata è un Mago, ha "{T}: Questa creatura infligge 2 danni a una creatura bersaglio".

foreignData.name: Perícia do Lavamante
foreignData.text:
A criatura encantada tem "{T}: Esta criatura causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura alvo."
Se a criatura encantada for um Mago, ela tem "{T}: Esta criatura causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura alvo."

name: Lavamancer's Skill
originalText:
Enchanted creature has "oc
T: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature."
If enchanted creature is a Wizard, it has "oc
T: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature."

rulings.text: If this card enchants a Wizard, the Wizard has both abilities and its controller can use either one.

text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature."
As long as enchanted creature is a Wizard, it has "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature."
